value.title: Practical Automated Machine Learning on Azure: Using Azure Machine Learning to Quickly Build AI Solutions
value.excerpt: Develop smart applications without spending days and weeks building machine-learning models. With this practical book, you’ll learn how to apply Automated Machine Learning, a process that uses machine learning to help people build machine learning models. Deepak Mukunthu, Parashar Shah, and Wee Hyong Tok provide a mix of technical depth, hands-on examples, and case studies that show how customers are solving real-world problems with this technology.

images.title: Practical Automated Machine Learning on Azure: Using Azure Machine Learning to Quickly Build AI Solutions

value.title: Recognize specific voices with the Speaker Recognition APIs in Azure Cognitive Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the Speaker Recognition APIs to identify specific people through their voices.

images.title: Recognize specific voices with the Speaker Recognition APIs in Azure Cognitive Services

value.title: Translate speech in real time with Azure Cognitive Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to translate speech and convert it to text through real-time transcription with the Speech Translation API in Azure Cognitive Services.

images.title: Translate speech in real time with Azure Cognitive Services

value.title: Building Bots with Microsoft’s Bot Framework: Getting Started
value.excerpt: This course is an introduction to the Microsoft Bot Framework v4 - a centralized framework that allows you to create, edit and deploy Chatbots quickly and easily.

images.title: Building Bots with Microsoft’s Bot Framework: Getting Started

value.title: Building Features from Text Data in Microsoft Azure
value.excerpt: This course covers aspects of building text features for machine learning using Azure Machine Learning Service virtual machines, including tokenization, stopword removal, feature vectorization, and more from natural language processing.

images.title: Building Features from Text Data in Microsoft Azure

value.title: Extracting Meaning from Natural Language with the Language Understanding Service (LUIS) on Microsoft Azure
value.excerpt: Extracting Meaning from Natural Language with LUIS will allow you to build apps and bots that are capable to understanding natural human language and being able to act on those commands.

images.title: Extracting Meaning from Natural Language with the Language Understanding Service (LUIS) on Microsoft Azure

value.title: Get Answers in Context with Semantic Search in Microsoft 365: DEVintersection 2019
value.excerpt: DEVintersection 2019 | Get Answers in Context with Semantic Search in Microsoft 365 | Bill Baer

images.title: Get Answers in Context with Semantic Search in Microsoft 365: DEVintersection 2019

value.title: Microsoft Azure Cognitive Services: Bing Spell Check API
value.excerpt: Real time spelling and grammar correction that works across multiple languages can make your app stand out.  Bing Spell Check uses advanced machine learning to perform context-aware spell checking.  Find out how to use it in this course.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Cognitive Services: Bing Spell Check API

value.title: Microsoft Azure Cognitive Services: QnA Maker
value.excerpt: Use QnA Maker and Azure Bot Service to create an FAQ chat bot that can answer questions using a natural language format. Deploy your bot to the web or other service like Slack, email, and text message.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Cognitive Services: QnA Maker
